channel.title: Duel Arena High Alcher
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="7"][B]DUEL ARENA HIGH ALCHER[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [SIZE="5"][FONT="Courier New"][B]For SCAR Divi 3.12 And SRL 4.0[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Features:[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - World Changer[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Puts Items In Proper Spots[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Anti-Bans[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Tells User What It Has Done In The Task Bar[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Anti-Randoms Although There Not Needed[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Can Alch Anything[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - It Can Tell A User What Its Done So Far From Another Computer[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Has Multiple Replys To Text And Duel Challenges[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Logs Out For A Set Amount Of Time After It Has Run For A Certain Amount Of Time[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - And Many More Little Things[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Setup:[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Have Your Player On The Wall At The Duel Arena As Shown[/SIZE][/FONT] [IMG]http://i217.photobucket.com/albums/cc184/Zarric_Hyunmin/HighAlcherSafeSpots.jpg[/img] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Have Nature Runes And The Noted Items To Be Alched In The First Two Inventory Spaces[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Logout[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Make Sure To Stay At The Login Screen[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Open The Script In Scar[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Do Setup[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Drag Crosshair To The RuneScape Window[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Hit "Run Script" And Watch It For A Bit To Be Safe[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Then Let It Run Until It Alches Everything Or Until You Need The Computer (h)[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Changes:[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Changed All "SendText" Functions To "TypeSend" Functions Thanks Zeta[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Changed All "ClickMouseMouse" Functions To "Mouse" Functions Thanks Zeta[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - I Have Added A Procedure That Gives The User A Report In The Report Box, So People Can Actually Check What All It Has Done. I Have Been Meaning To Do This For Quite Some Time[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - The "FindText" Function Doesnt Find Text Started With Numbers. So The Script Could Not Work With Username Having Numbers In From Of Them. I Have Fixed This. It Should Work With Any Username[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Well As You May Know The Script Changed The MainsName And Username If They Were Not In The Correct Format. They Must Be Typed As Seen In The Chat Box. It Didnt Really Work, So I Fixed It Now It Works Perfectly[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - I Changed The Script To Fix The Name Of What It Needs To High Alch If It Is Entered Incorrectly[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Fixed Up Some Procedures To Make The Version With The Script Run Better[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Notes:[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - I Have Gotten One Of My Pures To 94 Mage Using This Script, And My Pure Has Not Gotten Banned.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Poll: [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="3"][B](Please Vote Above)[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Should I Add A Form To My Script?[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]SCAR: [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="3"][B](Guide On How To Get/Install SCAR) [/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Go To [URL=http://"http://www.freddy1990.com/"]http://www.freddy1990.com[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - In The Navigation Title On The Left, Under Programs, Click "SCAR"[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Then Simply Click On The Green "Download SCAR" Button. Current Version Is "3.12C"[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Click Run[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Then Install It However You Want[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]SRL: [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="3"][B](Guide On How To Get/Install SRL) [/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Run SCAR[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Then Go To File[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Then Go Download SRL[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - If You Want You Can Download The Includes, I Usually Do For The Hell Of It[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Bugs: [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="3"][B](Please Post Any Bugs You Find)[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - I Wanted It To Tell The User How Much More Experience Is Needed To Level, But There Seems To Be A Problem With The "GetXP" Function. So This Will Not Be Fixed Until A New Version Of SRL Is Out, That Has This Function Working Properly. I Tried This Function With Other Stats Like Hitpoints And Attack, And It Seems To Work Fine, Must Just Not Work For Magic[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Updates:[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - Im Always Working On Making This Script Better. So Keep Checking Back For Updated Versions.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Downloads:[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.13(SCARDivi3.12-SRL4.0).scar Downloaded 11 Times[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.25(SCARDivi3.12-SRL4.0).scar Downloaded 9 Times[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.35WithForm(SCARDivi3.35-SRL4.0).scar Downloaded 3Times[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]Different Versions:[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.34(SCARDivi3.12-SRL4.0).scar Does Not Have A Form. It Is More Stable Then The Version With The Form.[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.35WithForm(SCARDivi3.35-SRL4.0).scar Has A Form. It Seems To Be Perfectly Stable From What I Can Tell On My Computer. It Also Has Loads Of Other Things In It. Deffinitly Worth Checking Out[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="4"][B]How To Download Download:[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - To Download Follow The Link Below![/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT="Courier New"][SIZE="2"] - [url=http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/duel-arena-high-t21281.html]http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/duel-arena-high-t21281.html[/url][/SIZE][/FONT] [br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2007, 03:04:05 AM[/size][hr]I did not know that this site did not use HTML. I'm to lazy to fix it. If you follow the link it will take you to a better site.

item.title: Duel Arena High Alcher
item.dc:creator: @Zarric_Hyunmin Zarric Hyunmin
item.description:
@Zarric_Hyunmin wrote:

[CENTER][FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“7”]DUEL ARENA HIGH ALCHER[/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=“5”][FONT=“Courier New”]For SCAR Divi 3.12 And SRL 4.0[/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Features:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - World Changer[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Puts Items In Proper Spots[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Anti-Bans[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Tells User What It Has Done In The Task Bar[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Anti-Randoms Although There Not Needed[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Can Alch Anything[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - It Can Tell A User What Its Done So Far From Another Computer[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Has Multiple Replys To Text And Duel Challenges[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Logs Out For A Set Amount Of Time After It Has Run For A Certain Amount Of Time[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - And Many More Little Things[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Setup:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Have Your Player On The Wall At The Duel Arena As Shown[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Have Nature Runes And The Noted Items To Be Alched In The First Two Inventory Spaces[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Logout[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Make Sure To Stay At The Login Screen[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Open The Script In Scar[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Do Setup[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Drag Crosshair To The RuneScape Window[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Hit “Run Script” And Watch It For A Bit To Be Safe[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Then Let It Run Until It Alches Everything Or Until You Need The Computer (h)[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Changes:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Changed All “SendText” Functions To “TypeSend” Functions Thanks Zeta[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Changed All “ClickMouseMouse” Functions To “Mouse” Functions Thanks Zeta[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - I Have Added A Procedure That Gives The User A Report In The Report Box, So People Can Actually Check What All It Has Done. I Have Been Meaning To Do This For Quite Some Time[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - The “FindText” Function Doesnt Find Text Started With Numbers. So The Script Could Not Work With Username Having Numbers In From Of Them. I Have Fixed This. It Should Work With Any Username[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Well As You May Know The Script Changed The MainsName And Username If They Were Not In The Correct Format. They Must Be Typed As Seen In The Chat Box. It Didnt Really Work, So I Fixed It Now It Works Perfectly[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - I Changed The Script To Fix The Name Of What It Needs To High Alch If It Is Entered Incorrectly[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Fixed Up Some Procedures To Make The Version With The Script Run Better[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Notes:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - I Have Gotten One Of My Pures To 94 Mage Using This Script, And My Pure Has Not Gotten Banned.[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Poll: [FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“3”](Please Vote Above)[/SIZE][/FONT] [/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Should I Add A Form To My Script?[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]SCAR: [FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“3”](Guide On How To Get/Install SCAR) [/SIZE][/FONT][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Go To http://www.freddy1990.com[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - In The Navigation Title On The Left, Under Programs, Click “SCAR”[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Then Simply Click On The Green “Download SCAR” Button. Current Version Is “3.12C”[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Click Run[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Then Install It However You Want[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]SRL: [FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“3”](Guide On How To Get/Install SRL) [/SIZE][/FONT][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Run SCAR[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Then Go To File[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Then Go Download SRL[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - If You Want You Can Download The Includes, I Usually Do For The Hell Of It[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Bugs: [FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“3”](Please Post Any Bugs You Find)[/SIZE][/FONT] [/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - I Wanted It To Tell The User How Much More Experience Is Needed To Level, But There Seems To Be A Problem With The “GetXP” Function. So This Will Not Be Fixed Until A New Version Of SRL Is Out, That Has This Function Working Properly. I Tried This Function With Other Stats Like Hitpoints And Attack, And It Seems To Work Fine, Must Just Not Work For Magic[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Updates:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - Im Always Working On Making This Script Better. So Keep Checking Back For Updated Versions.[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Downloads:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.13(SCARDivi3.12-SRL4.0).scar Downloaded 11 Times[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.25(SCARDivi3.12-SRL4.0).scar Downloaded 9 Times[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.35WithForm(SCARDivi3.35-SRL4.0).scar Downloaded 3Times[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]Different Versions:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.34(SCARDivi3.12-SRL4.0).scar Does Not Have A Form. It Is More Stable Then The Version With The Form.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - DuelArenaHighAlcherV2.35WithForm(SCARDivi3.35-SRL4.0).scar Has A Form. It Seems To Be Perfectly Stable From What I Can Tell On My Computer. It Also Has Loads Of Other Things In It. Deffinitly Worth Checking Out[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“4”]How To Download Download:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - To Download Follow The Link Below![/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=“Courier New”][SIZE=“2”] - http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/duel-arena-high-t21281.html[/SIZE][/FONT]
[br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2007, 03:04:05 AM[/size][hr]I did not know that this site did not use HTML. I’m to lazy to fix it. If you follow the link it will take you to a better site.

Read full topic
